Patient Population A retrospective cross-sectional observational study was carried out in the multidisciplinary ACKD unit of the Hospital Universitario La Princesa (Madrid, Spain) from February 2012 to February 2022. Nutrients2022, 14, 3848 3of15 Patients older than 18 years were eligible if they had an estimated glomerular filtration rate (estimated glomerular filtration rate) ≤ 45 milliliters per minute/1. 73 m2 or chronic kidney disease stage 3b-5 not on Dialysis 1 and were in the ACKD unit for more than 3 months of follow-up before being included in the study.
